text: Esteban Hotesse (February 11, 1919 – July 8, 1945) was an American United States Army Air Force second lieutenant and member of the World War II Tuskegee Airmen. He was the only Dominican-born member of the famed Tuskegee Airmen. He died in a B-25 Mitchell crash in July 1945. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:1945 deaths Category:Aviators killed in aviation accidents or incidents in the United States Category:People from Espaillat Province Category:Tuskegee Airmen Category:United States Army Air Forces personnel of World War II Category:United States Army Air Forces personnel killed in World War II Category:Victims of aviation accidents or incidents in 1945
title: Esteban Hotesse
